content:
Diagnosis:		Left parotid mucoepidermoid carcinoma

Management:		12 Jan 2024 Left superficial parotidectomy

Histology:		pT2N0 intermediate grade mucoepidermoid carcinoma, clear margins

Current Situation:	Post-operative radiotherapy review, week 4 of 6

[redacted name] attended for review during radiotherapy treatment today. She is tolerating treatment well with grade 1 skin reaction and mild fatigue. The left parotid surgical site shows good healing. She reports mild xerostomia but maintains good oral intake. Her weight is stable at 68kg. No evidence of facial nerve weakness. She is managing to continue working part-time as planned.

She will complete radiotherapy on 15/3/24. We have arranged follow-up in the combined Head & Neck clinic in 6 weeks with repeat imaging. Blood tests including TFTs will be checked prior to clinic review.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: intermediate grade mucoepidermoid carcinoma, clear margins

cancer_timeline.value: Commenced adjuvant radiotherapy, currently in week 4 of 6

patient_facts.value: grade 1 skin reaction, good healing of left parotid surgical site, no facial nerve weakness

status_updates.value: Post-operative parotid cancer patient tolerating adjuvant radiotherapy well with minimal side effects
Grade 1 radiation skin reaction and mild fatigue
Continuing radiotherapy, due to complete on 15/3/24
Blood tests including TFTs prior to clinic review
Combined Head & Neck clinic review in 6 weeks with imaging
